title: Retirement system contribution not affected
context: ยง303-5 Retirement system contribution not affected. A reduction in salary authorized by an employee under terms of this chapter shall in no way alter the amount of regular compensation or gross salary upon which the employee&rsquo;s contribution to the employees&rsquo; retirement system is based. [L 1967, c 40, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง303-5; gen ch 1985]
